title: Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Desk: Drawer, Top Drawer Across, Two Stacked Drawers at Left with Horizontal and Vertical Pulls Joined in L-Shape", 1936
markings:
Stamped in black ink: at top right and again at center, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES;
at lower right DONALD DESKEY/ 630 FIFTH AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout: inscribed in graphite: at center, wood types and quantities; below line just above lower edge, three elevations and one corner formation; lower right hand corner, [Deskey # ] 8481

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Desk: Drawer, Top Drawer Across, Two Stacked Drawers at Left with Horizontal and Vertical Pulls Joined in L-Shape", 1936.
1936. Graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1772.
